body: 几年后？这是怀了个哪吒？
就喜欢这种公车私有化的剧情捏，有种莫名的快感
最后有惊喜，有作者前几部的主角登场，希望继续出后续

DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS DO NOT READ THIS If you are reading this comment your dick will be shortened by 4 inches within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry, please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk.

I have a simpler answer for you guys. The uploader made a mistake or is trolling.

This artist is Kokutou Nikke, and their art has been uploaded on this site many times before.

Dafuq! This gotta be a mistake. According to Baka-Updates, Kurihara Kenshirou has no other pen name or association: https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=42259 *** To test if this site is correct, try "Tachibana Omina" and it is correct: https://www.mangaupdates.com/authors.html?id=19379 *** This erroneous upload should be deleted and reuploaded with the correct crediting.
Huh? But why is the title attributing this work to Kurihara Kenshirou(KK)??? Are Kokutou Nikke and KK the same artist???
